Sentencas: Over the last decade the interest in thick nano-structured layers has been increasingly growing.

Sentencas: Several new applications, including nanostructured thermoelectric coatings, thermally sprayed photovoltaic systems and solid oxide fuel cells, require reduction of micro-cracking, resistance to thermal shock and/or controlled porosity.

Sentencas: The high velocity suspension flame spray (HVSFS) is a promising method to prepare advanced materials from nano-sized particles with unique properties.
Titulo: Numerical investigation of combustion and liquid feedstock in high velocity suspension flame spraying process

Sentencas: However, compared to the conventional thermal spray, HVSFS is by far more complex and difficult to control because the liquid feedstock phase undergoes aerodynamic break up and vaporization.

Sentencas: The effects of suspension droplet size, injection velocity and mass flow rate were parametrically studied and the results were compared for axial, transverse and external injection.

Sentencas: The model consists of several sub-models that include pre-mixed combustion of propane-oxygen, non-premixed ethanol-oxygen combustion, modeling aerodynamic droplet break-up and evaporation, heat and mass transfer between liquid droplets and gas phase.

Sentencas: Thereby, the models are giving a detailed description of the relevant set of parameters and suggest a set of optimum spray conditions serving as a fundamental reference to further develop the technology.
